snippet: The lawyer representing the family of Sian Green, whose left leg was severed in the Midtown Manhattan crash, said they were shocked and disappointed that no charges would be filed against Faysal Himon.
abstract: Office of Manhattan District Attorney Cyrus R Vance announces that no charges will be filed against cabdriver Faysal Himon, who crashed onto pedestrian plaza in Midtown Manhattan in August, severing leg of British tourist Sian Green; lawyer representing Green's family says they are shocked and disappointed at decision.
lead_paragraph: The lawyer representing the family of Sian Green, whose left leg was severed in the Midtown Manhattan crash, said they were shocked and disappointed that no charges would be filed against Faysal Himon.

headline.main: No Charges Against Cabby in Crash Injuring Tourist
headline.print_headline: No Charges Against Cabby In Crash Injuring Tourist
